mapper.select: SELECT distinct pms_pk_plan.id, pms_pk_plan.name, pms_pk_plan.description, pms_pk_plan.punch_quantity, pms_pk_plan.start_time, pms_pk_plan.end_time, pms_pk_pattern.description AS plan_pattern, pms_pk_plan_status.description AS plan_status FROM pms_pk_plan, pms_pk_pattern, pms_pk_plan_status, pms_pk_user_grab_ticket WHERE pms_pk_plan.id IN ( SELECT pk_plan_id FROM pms_pk_user_grab_ticket WHERE pms_pk_user_grab_ticket.user_id = #{uid} ) AND pms_pk_plan.pk_pattern_id = pms_pk_pattern.id AND pms_pk_plan.plan_status_id = pms_pk_plan_status.id ORDER BY pms_pk_plan.id DESC
